meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hokey.
meanings.sent1: The hokeyness of the movie made it hard to take seriously.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't help but laugh at the hokeyness of the magician's performance.
meanings.sent3: The hokeyness of the situation was so over-the-top that it became comical.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was filled with such hokeyness that it felt like a parody.
meanings.sent5: The hokeyness of the clown's act left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.sent1: The decorations had a certain hokeyness that reminded me of a small-town fair.
meanings.sent2: Despite its hokeyness, the old song still managed to bring a smile to my face.
meanings.sent3: The hokeyness of the souvenir shop's merchandise was oddly charming.
meanings.sent4: The hokeyness of the costume party made everyone look like characters from a B-movie.
meanings.sent5: The hokeyness of the roadside attraction added a quirky touch to the long drive.
